metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart sees the giant Shar Statue and lets it set in that she is in the temple of shar.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Lady Shar... so many must have toiled to make a visage so grand. It's beautiful...
0.context: NodeContext: Overawed at the sight of a statue of liberty-sized representation of Shar, in  the heart of a huge temple.
